about.summary: Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently of the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.

Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently of the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.

name: r-dorng
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.8.6.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dorng
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/doRNG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/doRNG/doRNG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6683baec10cf8f6a44620d95ef06fec60b3f7911100827e392774a2ebdad7e8c

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-foreach
    - r-iterators
    - r-rngtools >=1.5
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-foreach
    - r-iterators
    - r-rngtools >=1.5

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('doRNG')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('doRNG')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://renozao.github.io/doRNG
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides functions to perform reproducible parallel foreach loops, using independent random streams as generated by L'Ecuyer's combined multiple-recursive generator [L'Ecuyer (1999), <DOI:10.1287/opre.47.1.159>]. It enables to easily convert standard %dopar% loops into fully reproducible loops, independently of
    the number of workers, the task scheduling strategy, or the chosen parallel environment and associated foreach backend.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
